verbs.description: Just a few days after Anthony Scaramucci [V: was] named White House communications director , he reached out to a music publicist who set up a June 2016 Trump Tower meeting with a Kremlin - connected lawyer . " If we remain consistent and united I do n't envisage any issues we ca n't ride out , " he wrote .
